alert.note: Alert for Hillsborough; Polk (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued March 15 at 10:53PM EDT until March 15 at 11:30PM EDT by NWS Tampa Bay
info.description: The National Weather Service in Ruskin has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Eastern Hillsborough County in west central Florida... Southwestern Polk County in central Florida... * Until 1130 PM EDT. * At 1052 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from Hillsborough River State Park to near Greater Sun Center, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Lakeland, Plant City, Mulberry, Alafia River State Park, Hillsborough River State Park, Mango, Fort Lonesome, Fish Hawk, Plant City Airport and Boyette. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
